description: Smooth and very easy to use. Makes programming enjoyable

Installs but won't run and it cannot be launched at all.

You can try getting it to install with: snap install --devmode neovide 
but then you run into a different problem that your config files are ignored and it's still not recognised in the UI properly.

Known issue and unfixed for nearly 1 year.
summary: Great app but it's broken in Snap

description: Apparently installed stable but nowhere to be seen. Deleting by clicking rubbish bin...

Avoir une GUI de NeoVim est très utile, les plugins peuvent être plus poussés et on peut ajouter différentes animations.

Cela permet d'avoir un éditeur texte à peu près équivalent à Gvim mais en se basant sur NeoVim et pas VIM
Great app, looks beautiful and feels good to use. I configured it with just ~10 lines of code.
